data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Bao-Shi, Zhang, Feng (2019): Three new species of the genus Zodarion (Araneae, Zodariidae) from China. ZooKeys 813: 67-87, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.813.29683, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.813.29683
